I've been very clear about my feelings towards Litecoin, the insider trading (coinbase), pump and dump (Mt. Gox) and Charlie lee's trade of the century just solidify my thesis back in November that Litecoin will one day trade to ZERO.

The only reason Litecoin has stuck around this long is due to Charlie's employment and relationship with coinbase and countless bagholders from the 2013 exit pump. Somehow branded as the "Silver" to Bitcoin's "Gold" it was seen as a cheaper alternative. Litecoin is worthless.

@SatoshiLite, Diana Kelly and myself with the signed global concert agreement where the #litecoin community will play a role in making the planet a better place for all. Stay tuned. Its about to ger real, folks!  #LTCSF18  #litecoinfam  https://t.co/PaE6ZY4Y6S
